name: Comment Templates
description: Adds a comment template button on the comment menu for demon, weekly and daily levels.

template_demon.name: Demon Comment Template
template_demon.description:
Sets the comment template for demon levels.
<cg>AttemptCount</c> - Replaces with the amount of attempts on the level
<cg>DemonCount</c> - Replaces with the current amount of demons beaten.

template_weekly.name: Weekly Comment Template
template_weekly.description:
Sets the comment template for weekly levels.
<cg>AttemptCount</c> - Replaces with the amount of attempts on the level
<cg>DemonCount</c> - Replaces with the current amount of demons beaten.
<cg>WeeklyID</c> - Replaces with the current amount of weekly levels beaten.

template_daily.name: Daily Comment Template
template_daily.description:
Sets the comment template for daily levels.
<cg>AttemptCount</c> - Replaces with the amount of attempts on the level
<cg>DailyID</c> - Replaces with the current amount of daily levels beaten.
